alert.note: Alert for Jefferson; Leon; Madison (Florida) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Severe Thunderstorm Warning issued July 22 at 2:31PM EDT until July 22 at 3:15PM EDT by NWS Tallahassee
info.description: The National Weather Service in Tallahassee has issued a * Severe Thunderstorm Warning for... Northern Jefferson County in Big Bend of Florida... Northeastern Leon County in Big Bend of Florida... Northwestern Madison County in Big Bend of Florida... * Until 315 PM EDT. * At 231 PM EDT, a severe thunderstorm was located 10 miles west of Monticello, moving east at 30 mph. HAZARD...60 mph wind gusts and penny size hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Expect damage to roofs, siding, and trees. * Locations impacted include... Tallahassee, Monticello, Madison, Greenville, Alma, Dills, Lamont, Hamburg, Nash, Miccosukee, Drifton, Lovett, Casa Blanco, Pisgah Church, Lake Miccosukee, Fincher, Festus, Aucilla, Baum and Lois. HAIL THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX HAIL SIZE...0.75 IN WIND THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX WIND GUST...60 MPH
info.instruction: For your protection move to an interior room on the lowest floor of a building.
